languages.text: {n}Руки скульптора ползают по камню, словно огромные железные пауки. Невидящий взгляд странным образом угадывает именно то, каким вы мечтаете себя видеть.{/n} "Ваша судьба скоро будет готова, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее доставят на ваш звездный корабль".

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Руки скульптора ползают по камню, словно огромные железные пауки. Невидящий взгляд странным образом угадывает именно то, каким вы мечтаете себя видеть.{/n} "Ваша судьба скоро будет готова, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее доставят на ваш звездный корабль".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sculptor's metal hands nimbly crawl up and down the stone like spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's metal hands nimbly crawl up and down the stone like spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

languages.text: {n}雕刻师的手在石头上来回翻动，仿佛巨大的金属蜘蛛一般。尽管他早已目不视物，但不知为何，他手中雕像的形象，恰恰是你理想中的自己。{/n}“您的命运很快就要完成了，大人，我会亲手将它送到您的星舰上。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}雕刻师的手在石头上来回翻动，仿佛巨大的金属蜘蛛一般。尽管他早已目不视物，但不知为何，他手中雕像的形象，恰恰是你理想中的自己。{/n}“您的命运很快就要完成了，大人，我会亲手将它送到您的星舰上。”

languages.text: {n}Las manos del escultor recorren la superficie de piedra como enormes arañas de metal. De algún modo, sus ojos ciegos capturan la imagen exacta de ti {mf|mismo|misma} que deseas ver.{/n} «Su destino pronto estará completo, {mf|milord|milady}. Haré que lo suban a su navío estelar».
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las manos del escultor recorren la superficie de piedra como enormes arañas de metal. De algún modo, sus ojos ciegos capturan la imagen exacta de ti {mf|mismo|misma} que deseas ver.{/n} «Su destino pronto estará completo, {mf|milord|milady}. Haré que lo suban a su navío estelar».

languages.text: {n}Heykeltıraşın elleri, devasa metal örümcekler gibi taşın üzerinde geziniyor. Kör bakışları bir şekilde tam da görmek istediğin versiyonunu tasavvur ediyor.{/n} "Kaderiniz yakında tamamlanacak {mf|lordum|leydim}. Yıldız yolcusu geminize teslim ettireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heykeltıraşın elleri, devasa metal örümcekler gibi taşın üzerinde geziniyor. Kör bakışları bir şekilde tam da görmek istediğin versiyonunu tasavvur ediyor.{/n} "Kaderiniz yakında tamamlanacak {mf|lordum|leydim}. Yıldız yolcusu geminize teslim ettireceğim."

languages.text: {n}彫刻家の手は巨大な金属の蜘蛛のように石の上を走る。どういうわけか、彼の盲目の視線は、あなたが見たいと思う正確な姿を描く。{/n}「あなたの運命は間もなく完了しますよ、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたの船に彫刻を運んでおきますね」
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}彫刻家の手は巨大な金属の蜘蛛のように石の上を走る。どういうわけか、彼の盲目の視線は、あなたが見たいと思う正確な姿を描く。{/n}「あなたの運命は間もなく完了しますよ、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたの船に彫刻を運んでおきますね」

languages.text: {n}Les mains du sculpteur courent sur la pierre comme de gigantesques araignées de métal. D'une manière ou d'une autre, son regard aveugle perçoit avec exactitude ce que vous voulez voir.{/n} « Votre destinée sera bientôt terminée, Votre Seigneurie. Je la ferai livrer à votre vaisseau stellaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains du sculpteur courent sur la pierre comme de gigantesques araignées de métal. D'une manière ou d'une autre, son regard aveugle perçoit avec exactitude ce que vous voulez voir.{/n} « Votre destinée sera bientôt terminée, Votre Seigneurie. Je la ferai livrer à votre vaisseau stellaire. »

languages.text: {n}Die Hände des Skulpteurs huschen über den Stein wie riesige metallene Spinnen. Irgendwie nehmen seine blinden Augen genau die Version von dir wahr, die du sehen möchtest.{/n} "Euer Schicksal wird bald vollendet sein, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich lasse es auf Euer Sternenschiff liefern."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze envisions the exact version of you that you wish to see.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Hände des Skulpteurs huschen über den Stein wie riesige metallene Spinnen. Irgendwie nehmen seine blinden Augen genau die Version von dir wahr, die du sehen möchtest.{/n} "Euer Schicksal wird bald vollendet sein, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich lasse es auf Euer Sternenschiff liefern."
